net.sourceforge.pebble.domain
Class BlogService

java.lang.Object
  net.sourceforge.pebble.domain.BlogService

public class BlogService
extends java.lang.Object

Service that encompasses all functionality related to getting, putting and removing blog entries.

Author:
Simon Brown
